title: Meal Prep
instructions:
You're the sort of person that likes to pop to the shops each day to get whatever ingredients you need for dinner. It gives you a nice excuse to stretch your legs and chat to the local shopkeeper.

Each day you choose a recipe, then check what's in the fridge, and note down what you need to buy.

Now you've decided to make your life a little easier, by writing a program to do the hard work for you!

Write a function called `shopping_list`. It takes two inputs: the contents of your fridge as a list of strings, and the items in the recipe as a list of strings. It should return the things you need to buy, as a list of strings.
hints: Think about what you would do in the real world to compare two lists
You need to check if each recipe item is already in the fridge
Consider writing a helper function to check if an item is in a list
Use push() to build up your shopping list
